bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Indoor AC Switches (1 kV to 38 kV) for Use in Metal-Enclosed Switchgear
Redline
IEEE Standard for Indoor AC Switches (1 kV to 38 kV) for Use in Metal-Enclosed Switchgear - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.20.4-2013 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.20.4-2001) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Indoor ac medium-voltage switches for use in enclosures for application in power circuits at voltages above 1 kV through 38 kV are covered in this standard. Stationary or drawout, manual or power operation, and fused or unfused are included.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
